Faq.question: Where are you located?
Faq.answer: Our beautiful puppies are raised in our home next to the beautiful Wasatch Mountains of Utah. We are located in the City of Orem just 50min south of the Salt Lake City Airport.

Faq.question: What is the price of you Puppies?
Faq.answer: The price of our puppies is dependent on Breed, Size, Color, Coat and Generation. We strive to maintain our prices as low as possible, while still providing our families with quality bred puppies raised with ALL the foundational skills necessary to thrive in their new home.

Faq.question: Standard Sized Puppies:
Faq.answer: Prices on our Standard Puppies range between $1,800-$2,400 with most being priced at $2,000 Standard adult weight starts at 45lbs. and goes up. Their height is approx. 21in. to 26in. tall at the shoulder.

Faq.question: Moyan Sized Puppies:
Faq.answer: Prices on our Moyan Puppies range between $2,000-$2,500 Moyan adult weight ranges between 30lbs. to 50 lbs. Their height is approx. 18in. to 21in. tall at the shoulder.

Faq.question: Small/Miniature Puppies:
Faq.answer: Prices on our Mini Puppies range between $2,300-$2,800 Mini adult weight ranges between 20lbs. to 35lbs. Their height is approx. 15in. to 17in. tall fat the shoulder.

Faq.question: Micro-Miniature Puppies:
Faq.answer: Prices on our Micro-Mini Puppies range between $2,500-$3,000. Mini adult weight ranges between 20lbs. to 35lbs. Their height is approx. 15in. to 17in. tall fat the shoulder.

Faq.question: How do deposits work?
Faq.answer: A $500 deposit is required in order to be placed on a puppy pick list or to reserve a puppy for you. Deposits are non-refundable but can be transferred to another puppy or litter for up to two years. You will be placed next in line on the desired litter's waitlist regardless of your spot on the original waitlist.

Faq.question: Do you deliver or ship your puppies?
Faq.answer: The simple answer to your question is YES! Distance usually is not a problem for us to safely place a puppy in their Furever Home. We have placed puppies in homes all over the US and Canada!

Faq.question: What is a Flight Nanny?
Faq.answer: FLIGHT NANNY: A Flight Nanny flies on the airplane with your puppy in the cabin. They will meet you at the airport nearest you. Cost for delivery via Flight Nanny is determined by the Nanny and runs between $475-$600. We must book our Nanny’s 3-4 weeks in advance, so we need to know ASAP if you plan on using this option!

Faq.question: Shipping your puppy
Faq.answer: Your puppy can fly in a crate via Cargo to the airport nearest you. There is a $400-$500 shipping fee for flying your puppy Cargo. The cost includes a crate, USDA Vet health certificate, airline ticket, and drop-off fee.

Faq.question: Airport Pick up
Faq.answer: You can arrange to fly in to Provo or Salt Lake City Airports and we can meet you near the airline passenger drop-off with your puppy. You will need to bring an airline approved soft puppy crate with you.

Faq.question: Ground Transport
Faq.answer: We can arrange to meet you part way or deliver entirely to approved areas for a fee. Delivery costs will be determined based on distance and costs of travel.

Faq.question: Breeder air delivery
Faq.answer: We are happy to deliver your puppy to the airport of your choice. Delivery cost is $450 plus the cost of a round trip flight.

Faq.question: Do you require puppy to be Spayed/Neutered?
Faq.answer: Yes, a spay/neuter is part of our purchase contract. We require ALL puppies to be Spayed/Neutered by 12 months of age or prior to reaching sexual maturity. A vasectomy is also acceptable, as well as a tubal ligation. We require proof of the procedure from your vet prior to releasing Registration Information.

Faq.question: What should I feed my puppy?
Faq.answer: Our puppies are fed a very high quality All Natural, Holistic Food which can be purchased directly from our website. We offer a 5 year Genetic Health Guarantee when our puppies are kept on our recommended food. We also offer discounts on the final purchase price of your puppy if you make you purchase prior to picking up your puppy. More details can be found HERE.

Faq.question: What are the MUST HAVES when I bring home my puppy?
Faq.answer: Please visit our affliates page for links to all the products we recommend to our Puppy Families.

Faq.question: Waiting on Nature
Faq.answer: As breeders we are left at the mercy of waiting on Mother Nature to take her course with our dogs and puppies. We cannot guarantee exactly when puppies will be born, size of litters, genders, colors, markings of puppies or exact day they will go home. We cannot guarantee the exact size or coat of your puppy. Sometimes planned studs don't work out for various reasons and we cannot guarantee any particular paired breeding until it takes place and pregnancy is confirmed. We will do our best to accommodate your desires for all of the above.

reviews.testimonial: Rosie is the best dog! She is really cute and cuddly! And she likes to lick a lot! I’m so grateful to have her. She is my best friend and the best dog I could ever have! Love her so much!

I first met Juan and Michelle With JYMR Doodles in the Lehi Cabelas store a couple of years ago. They had the most beautiful standard poodle with them. His name is Cash. He stole my heart as well as their kindness and willingness to answer my questions. In speaking with Michelle I found out about JYMR DOODLES! I had been talking to my John about getting either a labradoodle or golden doodle. When I finally retired the following spring I contacted Michelle. What a great experience! They are very professional. I was impressed by her knowledge and integrity. I picked my pup, we named him Buck and soon went back and purchased another one so our boy would have a great playmate. We named him Roo, so that would be BUCK AND ROO (I used to call my twin boys my little BUCKAROOS).  Long story short JYMR makes it very easy to work with them and they have quality pups. The temperament of my boys is amazing. They want to please and are good listeners. I have had Queensland healers, golden retrievers, and a boarder collie. The Labradoodles are by far the smartest and easiest dogs I have ever had. I wanted my sister in California to have JOY these pups have given me and went back to JYMR and purchased a Minnie labradoodle for my sister. We both cried when we picked her up. Her name is Betsy and I FaceTime with her a couple of times a week with my dogs. If you are looking for a breeder that is there for you and will answer questions and assist you with information, I highly recommend JYMR DOODLES. My pups are very healthy and beautiful.
